name: A Knightess in Shining Armour
description: Welcome to "A Knightess in Shining Armour", a medieval action-adventure game set in a snowy, fantasy world. Players will take on the role of a skilled knightess tasked with defending her kingdom from a powerful wizard and his army of monsters. With fast-paced combat and stunning landscapes, "A Knightess in Shining Armour" offers a thrilling gaming experience for players of all skill levels.
